title: Saint Seiya: Legend of Sanctuary
synopsis: From the dawn of time, there have been warriors who protected the Goddess Athena. Once forces of evil appear, these warriors, called the Saints will present themselves.
characters: ['Phoenix, Ikki', 'Dragon, Shiryuu', 'Pegasus, Seiya', 'Andromeda, Shun', 'Cygnus, Hyouga', 'Kido, Saori', 'Virgo, Shaka', 'Gemini, Saga', 'Aquarius, Camus', 'Aries, Muu']
voices: ['Nojima, Kenji', 'Akabane, Kenji', 'Yoshinaga, Takuto', 'Okamoto, Nobuhiko', 'Ono, Kensho', 'Koorogi, Satomi', 'Madono, Mitsuaki', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Miyamoto, Mitsuru']
